titleStmt.title: The pack-mans pater noster, or a dialogue betwixt a chapman and a priest. Newlie translated out of Dutch, by SIS.
titleStmt.author: Sempill, James, Sir, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Raban, for David Melvill,

notesStmt.note: In fact by SIS, i.e. Sir James Sempill.
Identified as STC 19087 on UMI microfilm reel 716.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Running title reads: A conference betwixt a cramer and a priest.
